text: Philipp Winkler (born 1986) is a German writer. He won the 2016 Aspekte- Literaturpreis. He studied at University of Hildesheim. In 2015, he was a fellow of the Graz "Workshop for Young Literature". == Works == * Hool, Berlin : Aufbau, 2016 ISBN 9783351036454 ==Works in English == * Hooligan, Arcade Publishing, 2018. ISBN 9781628728675 == References == Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Writers from Lower Saxony
title: Philipp Winkler
